dsOverview.title: China Monthly Station Precipitation, 1951-1980

summary.p: This dataset contains monthly precipitation amounts for Chinese stations for 1951 to 1980.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UMD/METEO > Meteorology Department, University of Maryland
UCAR/NCAR/CGD/CAS > Climate Analysis Section, Climate and Global Dynamics Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Precipitation > Precipitation Amount
